name: YOANURIMA
description:
This is a demo of a game that I have already written, and assets are being created for it. I have a simple battle engine created, but I'm personally thinking of adding combos. 

You play as a child(?????) who wants to challenge the 5 magic masters, to earn the "ultimate title".  Pretty boring story, right? Haha.  I just wanted to make a platformer.
